block.p: KALMUS-Stanley. Of Bronx, NY, on September 19, 2000, beloved husband of Sydell, devoted father of Michael and Andrew, cherished father in law of Meryl and Sherry. Dear brother of Milton, Judy, and the late twin brother Albert. Loving grandfather of Jason, Pamela, Jacob, and David. Services ''Gutterman-Musicant'' corner of Park and Passaic Street, Hackensack, NJ, on Thursday, September 21, 2000 at 11 A.M. Contributions to American Diabetes Foundation would be appreciated.
